#summary Simple Steps to enable your project in Android Binding

Just a few simple steps to install Android Binding!

 # [http://developer.android.com/resources/tutorials/hello-world.html Create an Android Project], just like normal one
 # [http://code.google.com/p/android-binding/downloads/list Download] the latest release of Android Binding (jar file)
 # Reference the jar file in the project build path

For more picture and step-by-step, visit: [http://andytsui.wordpress.com/2011/02/08/tutorial-hello-android-mvvm/ Hello Android(MVVM)]. Also [http://andytsui.wordpress.com/category/tutorial/ Tutorial series] in the blog.
